name: 3D Platformer Tutorial (Parkace)
description:
The 3D Platformer Tutorial made by Dylan Troyer!

My three proposed modifications to this game:

1. Create an interesting, comprehensive and coherent level - acting as the final level of the game.

2. Add multiple additional levels - to help prepare the player for the final levelA

3. Add new obstacles into the game - hazards like spikes or rotating balls of fire
